name: Line Storage Desk Office Bundle
description: Look and feel good as you work with the Aeron Office Chair and storage desk bundle. Available in oak or walnut, the Line Storage Desk provides a striking contrast to Aeron's engineered aesthetic. Designed to support a wide range of bodies, postures, and activities, Aeron will keep you comfortable, even for long periods of work. Save by purchasing this ergonomic office chair and storage desk combo instead of buying items individually.

name: Copenhague 90 Desk
description: Part of a furniture series created for the University of Copenhagen, the Copenhague 90 Desk (2013) couples graceful, asymmetrical legs with a streamlined tabletop in a matte finish that's resistant to fingerprints and easy to clean. This modern wood office desk is made in Denmark.

name: Distil Desk
description: Enhance your minimalist aesthetic with the Distil storage office desk. With an expansive molded wood top, out-of-site storage solutions, and even cord management, this hardworking desk can do it all — without looking over-designed. The thoughtful details are what sets this desk apart, like the curved edges that are designed just so to ensure the desktop doesn't dig into your arms during long workdays. Bring home this versatile design, and use it as an elegant table or a durable desk.

name: Folk Ladder Desk
description:
Crafted from solid wood, the Folk Ladder Desk (2017) has elegantly shaped ladder frames that support a desktop and two shelves. This modern ladder shelf desk combines with Folk Ladder Shelving to create working storage walls in a variety of configurations.
Small space-friendly home office solution.
Generous work area in a compact footprint.
Minimalist design features elegantly shaped solid wood rails.
Easy to move and can be expanded with Folk Ladder Shelving units.
Top shelf weight limit 15 pounds, desktop 40 pounds.
Wall mounting recommended; not included with In-Home Delivery service.

name: Jarvis Bamboo Standing Desk
description: Tap into your flow with the all-in-one Jarvis Standing Desk. Designed to promote wellness and movement, Jarvis encourages a variety of sitting and standing positions throughout the workday with a customizable setup. Easily adjust the height of the bamboo tabletop with the push of a button on an up-down touch pad or an OLED programmable handset. With the option of a powered grommet, you can easily charge devices right on your desktop. This is the authentic Jarvis Standing Desk by the Oregon-based company Fully. Fully is a Certified B Corporation dedicated to enhancing the quality of your work and workspace with high-quality design. With an eye toward making a positive impact on customers, as well as the planet, Fully’s products are responsibly produced and packaged. Jarvis’s tabletop is made of bamboo, chosen both for its natural beauty and rapid renewability. The bamboo, which releases 35% more oxygen than an equivalent stand of trees, is grown without pesticides or fertilizers. When the plant is fully mature in just five years, it’s harvested by hand to preserve the root structure. Plus, Jarvis is shipped in 100% recyclable and EPE-free packaging. If selecting the grommet option, the white Jarvis Desk will ship with black grommets installed, and white grommets will ship separately.

description: Tap into your flow with the all-in-one Jarvis Standing Desk. Designed to promote wellness and movement, Jarvis encourages a variety of sitting and standing positions throughout the workday with a customizable setup. Easily adjust the height of the bamboo tabletop with the push of a button on an up-down touch pad or an OLED programmable panel. name: Line Storage Desk
description:
The Line File Storage Desk (2020) features a large work surface with drawers and cubbies for office supplies and stationery. A discreet panel opens to reveal a clever cable management system with space for power strips and wireless routers, as well as a convenient cord escape. Finished on all sides, this office storage desk is made in Malaysia.
A large work area with thoughtfully designed storage.
Drawers and cubbies one side, space for a router and more on the other.
Sleek louvered design on four sides.

name: Mode Desk
description: Mode Desk is a study in pared down design. This high-performance, small space desk is equipped with cable management, a leg slot for discreet wire routing, and an optional drawer cabinet that can be installed on either side. Choose your top, drawer, and handle colors to make it your own. Mode’s laminate surface is durable and easy to clean. Designed for Herman Miller by Afteroom, the Stockholm-based design studio founded by Hung-Ming Chen and Chen-Yen Wei.

name: Renew Desk with Embedded Power
description: The antidote to a sedentary lifestyle isn't standing all day. In fact, our research shows that a combination of sitting, standing, and moving throughout the day is optimal. Enter the Renew rectangular sit-to-stand desk. Designed for both practicality and beauty, this modern sit-to-stand table delivers a powerful, one-touch lift that handles bigger monitors with ease; cord management; and even aesthetic considerations like concealed screw heads, beveled edges, and a range of finishes and sizes. Includes concealable power station with four AC outlets and two USB ports for powering devices large and small.

name: Risom Desk
description: Originally designed for his own home, Jens Risom created this modern wood office desk as a small-space solution. Crafted with the utmost care, the desk is made with a solid wood frame and topped with stain-resistant leather. The pared-down design includes a discreet drawer with removable trays to keep your desk accessories organized and tucked out of sight.

name: AGL Table
description: A sculptural plane 29 inches above ground level, the AGL Table makes a stunning dining or meeting room table. Defined by its soft, welcoming edge and efficient understructure, it communicates sophistication and intelligence.

name: Don’t Leave Me Side Table
description: Copenhagen-based industrial designer Thomas Bentzen believes that everything he creates should engage and create curiosity, be functional and meet human needs while in use. In other words, this is a designer who thinks beyond the obvious. A perfect example of his approach is the lightweight, portable Don't Leave Me Side Table (2007) for Danish design collective HAY. Also known as the DLM Table, it features a handle for easy carrying from room to room and a tripod base for excellent stability. Made in China.

description: Copenhagen-based industrial designer Thomas Bentzen believes that everything he creates should engage and create curiosity, be functional and meet human needs while in use. In other words, this is a designer who thinks beyond the obvious. A perfect example of his approach is the lightweight, portable Don't Leave Me Side Table (2007) for Danish design collective HAY. Also known as the DLM Table, it features a handle for easy carrying from room to room and a tripod base for excellent stability. Made in China.

name: Doubleframe™ Table
description: The all-around versatile Doubleframe Table based off the 1930's Parsons Table, is a salient example of Michael Anastassiades's brilliance, and a seamless addition to your dining room. It is marked by thoughtful details and meticulous attention to materials and construction.

name: Eames Coffee Table
description: With a square or rectangular top offered in a selection of natural materials, the Eames Coffee Table stands on a sturdy base that combines wooden legs with metal cross-struts. The sleek-lined top comes in marble, solid walnut, or palisander veneer.

name: Eames Elliptical Table
description: The Eames Elliptical Table (1951) makes a dramatic statement with 89 inches of table length. The top consists of seven layers of Baltic birch plywood, beveled at 20 degrees and sandwiched between high-pressure laminate. The signature wire-rod base comes in your choice of white, black, or trivalent chrome.

name: Eames Elliptical Table
description: The Eames Elliptical Table (1951) makes a dramatic statement with 89 inches of table length. The top consists of seven layers of Baltic birch plywood, beveled at 20 degrees and sandwiched between high-pressure laminate. The signature wire-rod base comes in your choice of white, black, or trivalent chrome.

name: Eames Molded Plywood Coffee Table
description: Lightweight, compact, and versatile, the Eames Molded Plywood Coffee Table exemplifies the spirit of early Eames design. The original wood base coffee table features a slightly indented bent wood top and comes in a walnut, natural cherry, ebony, or white ash finish.

name: Eames Molded Plywood Coffee Table
description: Lightweight, compact, and versatile, the Eames Molded Plywood Coffee Table exemplifies the spirit of early Eames design. The original wood base coffee table features a slightly indented bent wood top and comes in a walnut, natural cherry, ebony, or white ash finish.

description: Lightweight, compact, and versatile, the Eames Molded Plywood Coffee Table exemplifies the spirit of early Eames design. The metal-base version features the original slightly-indented, bent-wood top, supported by slim metal legs.

name: Eames Rectangular Coffee Table
description: Made from solid walnut veneer with a clear coat finish, the Charles and Ray Eames Rectangular Coffee Table (1946) creates a warm focal point in your living or family room and adds an elegant touch to an entryway or bedroom. Available in two top sizes and multiple finish options, this Eames side table is an authentic Eames product by Herman Miller.

name: Eames Rectangular T-Leg Table
description:
A versatile design with a sturdy but streamlined base that affords plenty of legroom, the Eames Rectangular Table (1964) comes in a choice of top sizes and materials. Used as a long modern office desk or an elegant wood table, this authentic Eames Table by Herman Miller is Greenguard Certified.
Legendary husband-and-wife design team.
Constructed of recycled and recyclable materials.
Eco-Friendly Description: Indoor Advantage Gold certification is SCS Global Services' highest level of indoor air quality performance for furniture. The certification ensures that furniture products support a healthy indoor environment by meeting strict chemical emission limits for volatile organic compounds (VOCs).

name: Eames Table, Rectangular
description: Drawing on a theme of versatility, the Eames Table (1964) offers a durable, simple, and sleek design for a variety of settings. A sturdy streamlined base provides plenty of legroom, while leveling glides correct for uneven floor surfaces. An elegant take on the modern rectangular dining table, the Eames segmented base table ships assembled. This is an authentic Eames Table by Herman Miller.Legendary husband-and-wife design team.A range of size, base, and top options.Constructed of recycled and recyclable materials.

name: 2.5-inch Hard Floor or Carpet Caster
description: With its soft polyurethane tread, this 2.5-Inch Standard Hard Floor or Carpet Caster is ideal for multiple floor types. Purchase comes with 1 caster.

name: 2.5-inch Standard Carpet Caster
description: With its double-wheel construction, the 2.5-inch Standard Carpet Caster is perfect for use on low- to medium-pile carpet. Purchase comes with 1 caster.

name: 3-inch Hard Floor or Carpet Caster
description: Thanks to its larger size, this 3-inch replacement caster works well in areas with plush or high-pile rugs and carpets. And thanks to its polyurethane tread, it's also safe for hard floors. Purchase comes with 1 caster.

name: About A Chair 153 Task Chair
description: The son of a cabinetmaker and raised in the Scandinavian design tradition, Hee Welling understands the power of simple, logical and useful solutions. He's a graduate of the Royal Academy of Fine Arts in Copenhagen, and the founder of his eponymous design studio. While exhibiting at the Copenhagen design fair in 2004, Welling met Rolf and Mette Hay of the Danish design company HAY. This kicked off a partnership and several successful launches, one of which was the About A Chair (2009). Now a collection of 30 different products and one of the bestselling chairs in Scandinavia, About A Chair began with a desire to tell a story about a chair, thus its name. With its gently curved, comfortable seat and smooth-rolling base, AAC 153 offers pleasing proportions and a quietly elegant aesthetic for residential and commercial settings. Includes height-adjustable seat with gas-piston lift. Made in China.

name: About A Chair 153 Task Chair
description: The son of a cabinetmaker and raised in the Scandinavian design tradition, Hee Welling understands the power of simple, logical and useful solutions. He's a graduate of the Royal Academy of Fine Arts in Copenhagen, and the founder of his eponymous design studio. While exhibiting at the Copenhagen design fair in 2004, Welling met Rolf and Mette Hay of the Danish design company HAY. This kicked off a partnership and several successful launches, one of which was the About A Chair (2009). Now a collection of 30 different products and one of the bestselling chairs in Scandinavia, About A Chair began with a desire to tell a story about a chair, thus its name. With its gently curved, comfortable seat and smooth-rolling base, AAC 153 offers pleasing proportions and a quietly elegant aesthetic for residential and commercial settings. Includes height-adjustable seat with gas-piston lift. Made in China.

name: Aeron Chair
description: Aeron office chair revolutionized office seating with its defining design qualities: the pioneering Pellicle suspension material and its patented PostureFit SL back support, which affords the ideal sit — chest open, shoulders back, pelvis tilted slightly forward. Combining a deep knowledge of human-centered design with cutting-edge technology, the classic Aeron chair is engineered with state-of-the-art adjustability, from the arms, seat height, depth, and recline, to help you maintain the optimal seating posture so you can focus on the task at hand. And it comes available in three chair sizes, offering the most comfort to the largest range of users.Eco-Friendly Description: Awarded the industry-leading Cradle to Cradle V3 Silver Level certification, assessed on our environmental and social performance, Aeron is up to 91% recyclable based on available recycling facilities. The Aeron in Onyx goes one step further. It’s made of up to 2.5 pounds of ocean-bound plastic, helping to divert more than 44 metric tons of plastic waste from the ocean annually*. Aeron has also received the Indoor Advantage Gold certification, SCS Global Services' highest level of indoor air quality performance for furniture. The certification ensures that furniture products support a healthy indoor environment by meeting strict chemical emission limits for volatile organic compounds (VOCs). *Based on annual sales forecast.

name: Aeron Chair
description: Aeron office chair revolutionized office seating with its defining design qualities: the pioneering Pellicle suspension material and its patented PostureFit SL back support, which affords the ideal sit — chest open, shoulders back, pelvis tilted slightly forward. Combining a deep knowledge of human-centered design with cutting-edge technology, the classic Aeron chair is engineered with state-of-the-art adjustability, from the arms, seat height, depth, and recline, to help you maintain the optimal seating posture so you can focus on the task at hand. And it comes available in three chair sizes, offering the most comfort to the largest range of users.Eco-Friendly Description: Awarded the industry-leading Cradle to Cradle V3 Silver Level certification, assessed on our environmental and social performance, Aeron is up to 91% recyclable based on available recycling facilities. The Aeron in Onyx goes one step further. It’s made of up to 2.5 pounds of ocean-bound plastic, helping to divert more than 44 metric tons of plastic waste from the ocean annually*. Aeron has also received the Indoor Advantage Gold certification, SCS Global Services' highest level of indoor air quality performance for furniture. The certification ensures that furniture products support a healthy indoor environment by meeting strict chemical emission limits for volatile organic compounds (VOCs). *Based on annual sales forecast.

name: Aeron Classic Leather Armpads
description: Classic Aeron Leather Armpads dress up your classic Aeron. They're compatible with both stationary and adjustable arms on either classic Aeron chairs or stools. Choose color options to complement the color of your base. Sold in pairs.

name: AERON GAMING CHAIR
description: Aeron can be found in pro-sports locker rooms, recording studios, the MoMA permanent collection, and now, with you and your gaming setup. We worked with gamers to select the best configuration, and even updated the gaming chair with an Onyx colorway, our darkest and most eco-friendly shade yet. Enjoy the ultimate sit with the ergonomic gaming chair’s breathable yet supportive suspension, patented back support, and a unique forward seat angle adjustment that’ll keep you supported even when you’re leaning into the game.

name: Aeron Lumbar Support
description: Affix this unit to the frame of your Classic Aeron (manufactured before October 2016) and to adjust it to your back's natural curve. To determine size of chair, feel under the back-frame edge near top corner: one bump is A, two is B, and three bumps in a triangle is C.
